item.title: Fixing Access Issues Between ECS Containers and EFS Access Points
item.description: I recently had trouble connecting an ECS container to an EFS access point. Here’s an breakdown of what happened and how I fixed it: The Problem: When I tried to link an ECS container with an EFS access point, I got this error: "'b'mount.
